Author: domp
Content: I thought I'd open up a discussion around Startup School. I wasn't able to be there but I'd love to hear(and I'm sure everyone else not able to attend) about stories. Maybe you met a possible co-founder, got inspiration from a particular speaker, thought of a great new company idea, etc. Let us know!

Author: domp
Title: Tell your Startup School story to a person who wasn't fortunate to attend

Author: python_kiss
Title: VC investments in Web 2.0 start-ups increased 108% in 2006!
